title: SC EP:6 Witness Encounter: Face to Face with Sasquatch
itunes:title: SC EP:6 Witness Encounter: Face to Face with Sasquatch
description: In this episode we bring you one of the best Class A Bigfoot Encounter: Rebecca has had a couple scary encounters with Bigfoot including a very traumatic experience where she was face to face with Sasquatch. Rebecca will also be sharing some recent encounters and sharing her experience with Bigfoot and how her attitude has changed towards them.
